item.title: Liberal Newspapers Ban Dissenting Voices
item.description: The Connecticut Post has banned letters to the editor that criticize Barney Frank or Christopher Dodd, the two liberal Democrats who helped Franklin Raines, Jim Johnson, and other mortgage fraudsters rake in billions by blocking attempts at Congressional oversight. Just another sign that democracy in America is over. In November, Change.gov banned conservatives from asking questions or offering suggestions to Barack Obama. Gateway Pundit has more [click].
